import React, { Component } from 'react' import Logo from '../../../Assets/logo.svg' import { register } from '../../../Store/Action/auth'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; export class RegisterPage extends Component { state = { email: '', password: '', first_name: '', last_name: '', mobile: '' } onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.login(this.state.email, this.state.password); }; onChange = (e) => this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); render() { if(this.props.isAuthenticated){ return ; } return (

) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ isAuthenticated: state.auth.isAuthenticated, isLoading: state.auth.isLoading, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, {register})(RegisterPage);
